#summary Installation instructions and usage.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

==Installation==

  # [http://code.google.com/p/bitly/downloads/detail?name=bitly.zip Download]
  # Unzip into web server root directory.
  # Edit `config.php`.
  # Open `http://your-server/bitly/example.html` in your web browser.

Examine [http://code.google.com/p/bitly/source/browse/trunk/example.html example.html source].

==JavaScript usage:==

Include jQuery library and plugin files in your header.

{{{

  <script type="text/javascript" src="bitly/jquery.bitly.js"></script>

}}}

Setup.

{{{

  // path to bridge
  $.fn.bitly.defaults.url = 'bitly/bitly.php';

}}}

Some examples.

{{{

  // shorten every URL in <textarea class="message"></textarea>
  $('textarea.message').shortenUrl();

  // pass info about link address to yourInfoHandler
  $('a#link').bitly('info', yourInfoHandler);

}}}

==PHP usage:==

You may also use Bitly class alone on your server side.

{{{
  <?php
  include('lib/bitly.class.php');
  $bitly = new Bitly($login, $apiKey);
  $shortUrl = $bitly->shortenSingle($longUrl);
  ?>
}}}
